posts.post_content:
Hey everyone,

I have been getting into collecting pre-war cards in the last few years, but specifically my hometown Pirates. I have a few cards now but looking to grow my collection. I am not picky on quality and typically looking on the cheaper side unless something really catches my eye.

I really love T3 Turkey Reds (the only one I have currently is George Gibson), T206 portraits, and a few different caramel card sets. Would love to see what you might have that you're looking to sell!

posts.post_title: Re: Looking For: Pre-War Pittsburgh Cards
posts.post_content: Have a few Pirates scattered throughout here: [url]https://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url]
